actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to clarify and confirm the application of section 72 and the  nonapplication of section 1232 to face-amount certificates.

summary.text: States that face-amount certificates shall be considered endowment contracts rather than bonds for purposes of the Internal Revenue Code.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to clarify and confirm the application of section 72 and the  nonapplication of section 1232 to face-amount certificates.
